BR_text.BRsummary: Local models not available when running cortex get for the TF predictor and when live-reloading is enabled
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h4>Version</denchmark-h>
 
 0.22
 <denchmark-h:h4>Description</denchmark-h>
 
 When using a TensorFlow predictor and when live-reloading is enabled, local models that were passed in using the API spec, don't show up when running cortex get <api-name>.
 - name: api
    kind: RealtimeAPI
    predictor:
      type: python
      model_path: ~/local-model/resnet50/
      ...
 <denchmark-h:h4>Consequence</denchmark-h>
 
 No local model is accessible for inference.
